document.docAuthor: Zai-Hua, Yang, Xiao-Ming, Chen & Mao-Fa, Yang
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species and two new records of Ptecticus Loew (Diptera: Stratiomyidae: Sargiinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species and two new records of Ptecticus Loew (Diptera: Stratiomyidae: Sargiinae) from China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ptecticus vulpianus
Enderlein, 1914
: 586
. Type locality: Indonesia : Sumatra.
Ptecticus australis var. okinawaensis
Ôuchi, 1940
: 280
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ptecticus rectinervis
de Meijiere, 1914 : 15 . Synonymized by Rozkošný & de
Jong, 2001
.

Diagnostic characters and figures of male terminalia. Rozkošný & de
Jong ( 2001 )
.
